Code reference

Environments

class physilearning.envs.lv.LvEnv(max_tumor_size=1000, max_time=3000, carrying_capacity=1500, initial_wt=45, initial_mut=5, growth_rate_wt=0.0175, growth_rate_mut=0.0175, death_rate_wt=0.001, death_rate_mut=0.001, treat_death_rate_wt=0.15, treat_death_rate_mut=0.0, competition_wt=2400.0, competition_mut=1.0, treatment_time_step=60, reward_shaping_flag=0, growth_function_flag=0, normalize=1, normalize_to=1000)[source]

Environment for Lottka-Volterra tumor growth model

Parameters:

  • max_tumor_size (float) – (float) maximum tumor size in number of cells

  • max_time (int) – (int) maximum time in days

  • carrying_capacity (float) – (float) carrying capacity of the tumor

  • initial_wt (float) – (float) initial number of wild type cells

  • initial_mut (float) – (float) initial number of mutant cells

  • growth_rate_wt (float) – (float) growth rate of wild type cells

  • growth_rate_mut (float) – (float) growth rate of mutant cells

  • death_rate_wt (float) – (float) death rate of wild type cells

  • death_rate_mut (float) – (float) death rate of mutant cells

  • treat_death_rate_wt (float) – (float) death rate of wild type cells under treatment

  • treat_death_rate_mut (float) – (float) death rate of mutant cells under treatment

  • competition_wt (float) – (float) competition coefficient of wild type cells

  • competition_mut (float) – (float) competition coefficient of mutant cells

  • treatment_time_step (int) – (int) time step for treatment

  • reward_shaping_flag (int) – (int) flag for reward shaping

  • growth_function_flag (int) – (int) flag for growth function

  • normalize (bool) – (bool) flag for normalization

  • normalize_to (float) – (float) normalization factor for reward
